title: User registration and authentication
body: As a new user, I want to register and log in securely so that I can access personalised features.

title: Product browsing and filtering
body: As a customer, I want to browse available cakes by category or keyword so that I can quickly find what I want.

title: Product detail page
body: As a customer, I want to view detailed information about a cake so I can decide whether to buy it.

title: Order a custom cake
body: As a customer, I want to customise a cake and preview it so that I can personalise my order.

title: Add to cart and checkout
body: As a customer, I want to add items to a cart and securely checkout using Stripe.

title: View order confirmation and delivery
body: As a customer, I want to receive a confirmation and delivery estimate after checkout.

title: Admin product and order management
body: As an admin, I want to manage products and view customer orders through a dashboard.

title: UI and styling enhancements
body: As a user, I want a polished and accessible UI experience across devices.
